uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties

Interface PropertyLoaderProperties

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Copyable<PropertyLoaderProperties>, Observable<PropertyLoaderProperties>, Properties<PropertyLoaderProperties>, Self<PropertyLoaderProperties>

    public interface PropertyLoaderProperties
extends Properties<PropertyLoaderProperties>
    A Properties interface to provide localized texts for use by the PropertyLoader class itself, such as for reporting errors for improperly structured localization classes, etc.

    And implementation of this interface should be generated via PropertyLoader.getProperties(Class).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.Observable

        Observable.OwnedObserver<M>, Observable.OwnedObserverImpl<M>, Observable.TerminatingObserver<M>, Observable.WeakObserver<M,O>

      • translationNotFoundSubstitution

        String translationNotFoundSubstitution(String key)
        Load the property with the key property.loader.translation.not.found.substitution. This should be locale independent.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to find a translation for
        Returns:
        substitution when no translation is found for the given key

        Returns:
